Christmas In July BBQ Palm Invitation Postcard

Hot Deals! Christmas In July BBQ Palm Invitation Postcard – Christmas Invitations This item is trending! Christmas In July BBQ Palm Invitation Postcard help you save during this period Christmas In July BBQ Palm Invitation Postcard It’s in stock and ready to ship.Invite family and friends to your Christmas Themed Summer BBQ with these fun festive invitations.
They feature a watercolor of a decorated palm tree.
Customize these party invitations with your details, change the word BBQ to Party if you wish.
All the text is customizable.
Because we create our own artwork you won’t find this exact image from other designers.
Original Watercolor © Michele Davies. Price:$1.40
